name: Lulu's Adventure
description:
A new RPG about a cat named Lulu.

Releasing soon in its beta stage, it will feature many basic features any game should have.

Many bugs are still not patched, and I am fixing them every hour I work on this game, if you encounter any, leave it in the comments.

{Please note that at anytime, crucial assets to your save can and might be deleted, which means you have to restart.}
